EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis - APAC - 2015.02.1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Rescheduled: Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis
Hello {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar, Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis! We wanted to let you know that the webinar has been rescheduled from its original date and time.
Please keep an eye out for the new confirmation email with the updated date and time from GoToWebinar.
Thank you for your time, we look forward to seeing you at the webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Thomas Hadorn Managing Director Asia-Pacific Tricentis
Anil Kumar Singh Head, SAP Testing Practice Wipro
